title: Yow! Still going!
content: Dunno when I'd last seen this forum... I'd lost the bookmark for it ages back. Very pleased to see it's still active!

title: Re: Yow! Still going!
content:
There's been talk every once in a while about moving the forum. If you don't stay in touch it might be "gone" when you return. If you ever want to find it, try to remember "Public Commander Keen Forum".
Then go to: [url=http://www.pckf.com]www.pckf.com[/url]
This is just a url redirect and will be maintained and updated if necessary.

title: Re: Yow! Still going!
content: I think I've seen your name, but not 100% sure. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] Welcome back, anyways. And yeah, the board's still around. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-wink.gif[/img] Eat your veggies!

title: Re: Yow! Still going!
content: KeenRush, it must have been at least the best part of a year! Nice to be around again. smiles

title: Re: Yow! Still going!
content:
Yep, we just refuse to die don't we.

I don't think I've ever actually seen you, and it looks like you haven't been very active. I'm sure all your posts were erased in the big crash.

At least you're not a n00b.A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/rcwn.png[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: Re: Yow! Still going!
content:
*Pulls down collor, and shows him the metal loop*

"This is what keeps us from being strangled... and thus; Keen still hangs (alive) in Doom2. We just need to cut those ropes, and release TUIT!!!"Tough Guys Can Fix Their Own Problems!!!
